TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ScanMode extends System.Enum

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Bluetooth.ScanMode Connectable = int32(21)

summary.para: Indicates that inquiry scan is disabled, but page scan is enabled on the local Bluetooth adapter. Therefore this device is not discoverable from remote Bluetooth devices, but is connectable from remote devices that have previously discovered this device.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Bluetooth.ScanMode ConnectableDiscoverable = int32(23)

summary.para: Indicates that both inquiry scan and page scan are enabled on the local Bluetooth adapter. Therefore this device is both discoverable and connectable from remote Bluetooth devices.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Bluetooth.ScanMode None = int32(20)

summary.para: Indicates that both inquiry scan and page scan are disabled on the local Bluetooth adapter. Therefore this device is neither discoverable nor connectable from remote Bluetooth devices.
